front.title: Specification of the IPFIX File Format

abstract.t: This document describes a file format for the storage of flow data based upon the IPFIX Protocol. It proposes a set of requirements for flat-file, binary flow data file formats, then specifies the IPFIX File format to meet these requirements based upon IPFIX Messages. This IPFIX File format is designed to facilitate interoperability and reusability among a wide variety of flow storage, processing, and analysis tools.
